item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction Link to heading Hello, friend.

item.title: About
item.description: From starting my first company at the age of 14, to building a new department at Excalibur Press, I’ve learned that the tech world isn’t just about codes and algorithms; it’s about people, the stories behind them, and their connections with each other. My combination of skills and interest in both business strategy and technology - both refined at university as well as in the real world - has given me a unique perspective, one that values both the blueprint and the hands that build from it.
